question: The Amended Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS) aims:
option4: at reducing AT&C losses to 15% by Discoms
explanation: The Amended Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS) aims at Promotion of Technical Textiles. The scheme provides for 15 percent subsidy on capital investment, subject to a ceiling of 30 crore rupees for entrepreneurs over a period of five years.
